ygData.subject: A reply to Graham and rant/ramble
ygData.msgSnippet: My mind wandered with this one so be warned. ... Thanks Graham, I have been thinking about Unrest for a while now, but... Does Unrest give negative faction
ygData.messageBody:
My mind wandered with this one so be warned.
:)

Thanks Graham, I have been thinking about Unrest for a
while now, but... Does Unrest give negative faction hits
with any of the Nerco/Evil guilds that I will need to
keep high in my later career?
My major problem with leaving Antonica for Faydwer is
that my lag is so bad for crossing zones (2-2.5 minutes)
most times that I miss being able to get off the boat at
all.

Loading Please wait...
You have entered Butcherblock!
Loading Please Wait...
You have entered Ocean of Tears!
Loading Please Wait...
You have entered East Freeport!
Loading Please Wait...

This has happened to me literally so that for 2 hours I
was stuck on that damn boat. I only got off the boat
because I petitioned a GM who pulled me off with that
very nice...
"YOU have been SUMMONED by the gods, prepare yourself!"
First time though that jerk of a GM said I needed to be
in the same zone. But I wanted to be in Freeport and was
on my way to BB having just missed the zone. When he
realized how long he would need to wait for me to return
on the boat "miraculously" he was able to summon me from
OOT.
ANYWAY...
I also dread a teleport to Faydwer for the same reason.
I have no idea what NPCs hang around wizard teleport
rings. I doubt I will ever use a Druidic Succor for
obvious reasons. My wife's Bard worships Veeshan, and
when teleported to the Druidic ring in the Karanas she
was KoSed. With my lag I would never see that I am
being attacked, just the "Returning to home point..."
message.

Someone told me that getting more RAM would fix my lag
problems and that it may not be my 3d card. Anyone know
PCs well enough to respond on this? Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."



>From: "Graham Kays" <gkays@...>
>
>I'm not sure about how crowded your server is, but Blackburrow was
a good
>spot for me from 15-17. You can be bound in Qeynos and there is
a Barbarian
>merchant that you can sell to in West Karanas. Another good place
is
>Unrest. You can fight blue mobs in there until the cows come home,
just
>stay in the back of the house area to keep away from the trains.
Some aqua
>gobs and orc camps can be solo'ed outside in Dagnor's Cauldron as
well. I
>never found a merchant to sell to evils out in Faydwer though, so
I would
>sell to other players at a reduced cost. Be warned however, in both
cases,
>you will be far from any evil city bank and the coins can weigh you
down
>quite a bit. In long stays abroad, I typically use my copper to
buy
>summoned bandages and other such things that I don't really need,
but it
>helps keep my weight down. Having a few thousand coins was not uncommon
>(but it's nice when you do return to town and bank your 30+ plat
you've
>accumulated).
>
>Scragg Wraithbone of Bristlebane
